verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Saotra atolotra Anao re
ry Raiko,
Efa namonjy ny aiko Ianao
Sy nanazava tokoa ny saiko
Ka nanova ahy
Ho mpandova Anao

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Fitiavana re
Avy amin-dRay
Famindram-po be
No hafatra torina indray
(indray).

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tena tsy takatry ny saiko loatra
'Zany fitia nampidina Anao
Honina aty anatiko mpanota,
Tena tsy mendrika hitoeranao.
Fitiavana re, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Raiso ho Anao ity fo kely tia,
Raiso ny aiko, Ray, ka mba sasao,
Tena tsy mendrika anefa avia,
Raiso ihany ka diovy ho Anao.
Fitiavana re, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tompo hazony
Fandrao dia ho lasa,
'Ndrao ver aho
Raha lavitra Anao ;
Nefa mbola ato
Ny fo 'zay mikasa
Sady mitepo te hahita Anao.
Fitiavana re, sns.
